= How to detach and attach database =

== detach database: ==
   *command format:
        *mysqldump -uUSERNAME -p DATABASENAME > DATABASENAME.sqlï¼š
   *example: 
        *mysqldump -uroot -p entnetdb_v2 > /Users/crazymooner/Documents/workspace/System          Security/src/JDBC/createTable.sql

== attach database: ==
   *command format:
      *1.open a schema named DATABASENAME(entnetdb_v2)
      *2.mysql -uUSERNAME -p DATABASENAME < DATABASENAME.sql
    *example:
       *mysql -uroot -p entnetdb_v2 < /Users/crazymooner/Documents/workspace/System Security/src/JDBC/createTable.sql
